Known_Bugs_and_Limitations

Graph and Gauge

  • Live scrolling is not supported when animationOnDataChange="ON". In order to support scrolling on a graph with animationOnDataChange="ON", switch to delayed scrolling using a backing bean:

    ((CommonGraph)UIGraph.getImageView()).setZoomAndScroll(GraphConstants.ZS_DELAYED_SCROLL);

  • Firefox does not print Flash content, which is the default imageFormat for DVT Graph and Gauge. Applications should set the imageFormat to PNG for use in printable pages when the browser is Firefox. Flash content, including ADF DVT Graphs and Gauges, prints fine when the browser is IE.

  • Pie graphs with long labels have issues with label wrapping and truncating in Flash image format.

  • Gauge does not load if the gaugeLegendArea and thresholdSet/threshold child tags are used together. The workaround is to specify a numberType in the tickLabel child tag.

  • There are known issues using Flash graphs in BiDi locales. The workaround is to use PNG graph image format.

  • Users of the ADF DVT simple Graph tags listed in the table below are advised to use the following new syntax going forward:

    • Deprecated Tag New Syntax
    <dvt:dualYBarGraph> <dvt:barGraph subType="BAR_VERT_CLUST2Y">
    <dvt:stackedBarGraph> <dvt:barGraph subType="BAR_VERT_STACK">
    <dvt:dualYLineGraph> <dvt:lineGraph subType="LINE_VERT_ABS_2Y">
    <dvt:dualYComboGraph> <dvt:comboGraph subType="COMBINATION_VERT_ABS_2Y">
    <dvt:horizontalStackedBarGraph> <dvt:horizontalBarGraph subType="BAR_HORIZ_STACK">
    <dvt:stockCandleGraph> <dvt:stockGraph subType="STOCK_CANDLE">

  • The following attribute are renamed on the ADF DVT advance graph tag and are now also available on the Simplified graph tags wherever applicable:

    • Deprecated Attribute New Attribute
    noDataErrorText emptyText
    continuousTimeAxisInterval timeAxisInterval
    RelativeTimeRange timeRelativeRange
    explicitTimeRangeStart timeRangeStart
    explicitTimeRangeEnd timeRangeEnd
    customizationId id
    imageWidth inlineStyle="width:300px"
    imageHeight inlineStyle="height:300px"
    partialSubmit <not needed anymore>

  • The following attributes are moved from the advanced graph tag to the related child tags, hence are now also available for the simplified graph tags in general:

    • Deprecated advanced Graph Attribute New child tag Attribute
    <dvt:graph barShape="... > <dvt:seriesSet barShape="... >
    <dvt:graph lineDataLineDisplayed="... > <dvt:seriesSet lineDisplayed="... >
    <dvt:graph markerDisplayed="... > <dvt:seriesSet markerDisplayed="... >
    <dvt:graph seriesReferenceObjectDisplay="... > <dvt:referenceObjectSet displaySeries="... >
    <dvt:graph x1ReferenceObjectDisplay="... > <dvt:referenceObjectSet displayX1="... >
    <dvt:graph y1ReferenceObjectDisplay="... > <dvt:referenceObjectSet displayY1="... >
    <dvt:graph y2ReferenceObjectDisplay="... > <dvt:referenceObjectSet displayY2="... >
    <dvt:graph scrollbarPresenceGroups="... > <dvt:o1Axis scrolling="... >
    <dvt:graph scrollbarPresenceX1="... > <dvt:x1Axis scrolling="... >
    <dvt:graph scrollbarPresenceY1="... > <dvt:y1Axis scrolling="... >
    <dvt:graph scrollbarPresenceY2="... > <dvt:y2Axis scrolling="... >

  • The following attributes are renamed on the graph child tags:

    • Deprecated Attribute New Syntax
    <dvt:x1Axis majorTickStep="..." majorTickStepAutomatic="..."> <dvt:x1Axis majorIncrement="..." >
    <dvt:y1Axis majorTickStep="..." majorTickStepAutomatic="..."> <dvt:y1Axis majorIncrement="..." >
    <dvt:y2Axis majorTickStep="..." majorTickStepAutomatic="..."> <dvt:y2Axis majorIncrement="..." >

  • The following attributes are deprecated on the simplified graph tags:

    • Deprecated Attribute New Syntax
    title <dvt:graphTitle text="... >
    o1AxisTitle <dvt:o1Title text="... >
    x1AxisTitle <dvt:x1Title text="... >
    y1AxisTitle <dvt:y1Title text="... >

  • The following attribute is renamed on the Gauge child tag:

    • Deprecated Attribute New Syntax
    <dvt:tickMark majorTickCount="..."> <dvt:tickMark majorIncrement="..." >

PivotTable

  • In order to store edits, the PivotTable needs to be bound to a DataControl/Model that supports writeback operations. A Rowset based DataControl, like the BC4J based DataControl, is transformed into a cube and, due to the transformation, cannot support writebacks.

  • The following attributes are deprecated on the PivotTable:

    • Deprecated Attribute New Syntax
    cellImageClickAction - A method reference to a cell image click action Custom images should be specified via <dvt:dataCell> with child tag <af:image>, <af:icon> or <af:commandImageLink> instead
    cellImageClickListener - A method reference to a cell image click listener that will be called after an image click operation is performed in the pivot table Custom images should be specified via <dvt:dataCell> with child tag <af:image>, <af:icon> or <af:commandImageLink> instead
